title: The early films of Hans Richter = Ghosts before breakfast
brief_description: This surrealist experimental film was made in 1927 by artist-painter Hans Richter. The nazis destroyed the sound version of this film and classified it as “degenerate art”. The film shows everyday objects rebelling against their daily routine.
